game.name: Stickman maverick  bad boys killer
game.description:
It is time to try something unique and trendy! In order to take care of your intense gaming needs, we have tried here to get you covered with a latest action game where you have to clear the screen from all of the bad boys. Are you ready to play the role of an ultimate stickman soldier? Join Stickman Maverick Bad Boys Killer and be prepared to exterminate all of your enemies that can come from any direction of the screen!

Hey! Do not bother you are not alone as you would get a chance to access tons of awesome mass destruction weapons, and new stickman characters. Be careful and try to be as fast as you can to kill all your bad guys otherwise they will clear you from the screen! Grab your weapons and get ready to enter the battlefield to kill as many stickman as you can in this HTML5 shooting game! Common friends! You would have four different and powerful mechas to play with.

Choose from any weapon out of multiple weapons including bazookas, handguns and more in this cool action-packed side-scrolling shooter game! These bad guys will come running your way. But, you as a brave soul know how to face all sorts of enemies from thugs to giants. There are multiple daily missions to complete for you. It will be amazing to get through different gameplay types like Kill a number of enemies, Survive for X seconds and Capture the Flag. Good luck to ride one of the four exclusive giant mechas and release the needful lasers and explosives to make as much damage as you can to your enemies! Win and collect coins to upgrade your weapons to make your game more interesting!
